nodes.text: Lorik was a Human male Jedi Master and combat instructor who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the Sith Empire. A tan-skinned Human male with green eyes and brown hair, Lorik wore armored robes of white and gold while also carrying a lightsaber. He was stationed on the Core World of Alderaan, where he could be found in the building known as the Hall of Learning on the grounds of Castle Organa, the home of the Republic-allied noble House of Organa.

Master Lorik first appeared in the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a trainer for the Jedi Knight class on Alderaan. His location is also identified in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, which was released concurrently with the game in 2011.
